name: Approval Request Escalated (Approver)
description: Sent to the approvers that an approval request was escalated from and to when no actions have been taken on an approval request for an admin-configured amount of time.
subject: An Approval Request Has Been Escalated#if($previousApprover.identityID == $__recipient.id) From You To Another User#else To You For Review#end
body:
Dear ${__recipient.name},

An approval request for $approvalName was submitted by #if($requestee.name && $requestee.name != '') $requester.name for $requestee.name #else $requester.name #end. This request has been escalated #if($previousApprover.identityID == $__recipient.id) from you to $escalatedApprover.name due to no action being taken #else for your review after the previous approver #if($previousApprover.name && $previousApprover.name != ''), $previousApprover.name, did not take action #else did not take action #end#end on the request for $escalationDelay.

To review approval requests that are assigned to you, please go to: $__global.productUrl/ui/d/$approverPath


Thank you,
The ${__global.productName} Team
